title: Sorceress' Apprentice: Book One Initiation
description: A brand new series featuring an erotic lesbian and fetish story set in a world of adventure and magic. A young talented magic user, Trix Vernhorn has been chosen for the next apprentice to the most powerful Sorceress in all the land. Excited for her new life in the study of spells, her young impressionable mind had no idea what she was really getting into. The Sorceress is a dominating person with aspirations to instill discipline and sexual knowledge to her new pupil no matter what the cost. Trix has her hands full as she ponders on what exactly she had gotten herself into and if she can resist her desires!
author: Abby Kippner
